title: Speaker to handover letter to President with proposals from party leaders
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Parliament speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena has decided to handover a letter containing the proposals by party leaders to the President.
The decision was reached at the Party Leaders meeting on Wednesday (11).
Party Leaders will meet on Thursday (12) at the Parliament Complex once again to discuss the present situation in the country,
Speaker to handover letter to President with proposals from party leaders
New Prime Minister, Government that can command majority in Parliament will be appointed this week – President
No issues as long as protests remain peaceful – Army Commander
Terrorism stemming out of Temple Trees cause for violence- Ven. Omalpe Sobitha Thero
